item.title: Fig Balsamic Dressing
item.description: Ingredients Yields 2 Cups Ingredient Amount Soaked Black Mission Figs 10 Balsamic Vinegar 1/3 Cup Olive Oil 1 Cup Black Pepper 1/2 tsp Salt 1 tsp Lemon Juice 1 tsp Dijon Mustard 1 Tbsp Preparation Pre-soak Black Mission Figs in 1 cup of water for 2 hours, then reserve the water for later. Blend all ingredients until smooth, starting slow and adding reserved water if necessary. Should be creamy and thick.
